name: bee-shop-autotests
description: Example of Selenium tests with Mocha and Allure report

scripts.test:example: rm -rf allure-results && multi='progress=- mocha-allure-reporter=-' mocha test/auth.js
scripts.report: cp -a history_temp/history allure-results/ && allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && cp -a allure-report/history history_temp/ && allure open allure-report

author: dmred
